I did want to talk one last time about the styrofoam itself now I told you
there are basically two different kinds of start from there it's a beaded
styrofoam that when you scratch it all those little beads pop out everywhere
and they're stuck to you and everything and then there's the kind of I call the
construction styrofoam which is the pink blue stuff that's basically they put up
on a building and it insulates the building I love that stuff because it's
it's it's fairly sturdy it really holds up well so with the other stuff it can
be very weak you can reinforce that though on the hot wire at the hot wire
foam factory they do have coatings that you can put on the that kind of
styrofoam to make it sturdy or even this kind but I find if you just use the pink
insulation stuff you don't have to actually have to put a coating on if
you're just using it for tabletop stuff and not really supporting anything now
also I want to talk a little bit about paint because you know I base paint
everything you know either black or white mostly black which just makes it
easy to do but the foam will not take spray paint well you do not want to
spray paint it but but laitanan later bit up in a show you can actually use
that to your advantage if I'm doing kind of stone things or things that need to
be pitted I will hit it with some spray paint and it will kind of melt the
surface a little bit so you can't do it if you're getting that if you want to
get that kind of effect but you won't get the coverage of the black because
it'll kind of melt into the into the pink foam or in the white foam it'll
melt even more but it'll kind of melt into it and you won't be able to cover
it up with the black so you would this stuff you do have to hand paint it with
the acrylic paints which isn't a problem it's pretty easy to do so but if you are
going for that kind of stone texture a nice little nice little hitting it with
a the spray paint roller I kind of a bumpy texture so but I just
want to warn you do not try to paint the stuff with spray paint it will it will
